mapper.select: select m.*,d.deptname,j.job_category,j.menupath from member m, dept d, job j where m.deptno = d.deptno and d.job_category = j.job_id and id=#{id} and pass=#{pass}
select m.*,d.deptname,j.job_category,j.menupath from member m, dept d, job j where m.deptno = d.deptno and d.job_category = j.job_id and id=#{id}

select m.id,a.authorityname from member m, dept d, job g, groupauthority ga, authority a where m.deptno = d.deptno and d.job_category = g.job_id and ga.groupid = g.job_id and a.authorityid = ga.authorityid and m.id=#{id}
